content.rendered:
Here’s a quick update on our very busy Q3, including our three new team members, pre-tenanted launch, upcoming trips and more.

New Team Members

Upcoming Trips

The Source team are heading to Dubai and Turkey for exclusive, one-on-one property consultations with international investors.

Our sessions will cover essential investment topics, including:

  • Prime Investment Locations: key locations and regional differences
  • Purchase Process: how it works, legals and different purchasing structures
  • Financing Options: Overseas mortgage options & rates
  • Tax Considerations: understanding tax costs and implications
  • Property Management: access our professional letting and management services

Availability is limited, so if you or someone in your network is interested, book your meeting slot instantly below.

Book Meeting in Dubai

Book Meeting in Istanbul

New: Pre-Tenanted Investments

Source Pre-Tenanted Investment Opportunities are now available.

This off-market investment pipeline allows clients access to high-yield, pre-tenanted UK properties with cash flow from day one.

Our Pre-Tenanted Investments:

  • Affordable Entry Points: prices start from just £55,000
  • High Yields: up to 12% gross yields with years of track record
  • Instant Cash Flow: begin earning rental income from day one
  • Professional Management: enjoy peace of mind with expert property management
  • Prime Locations: invest in some of the UK's fastest-growing areas
  • Exclusive Access: access limited off-market opportunities via our HUB platform

Access Our Pre-Tenanted Investment Opportunities Here.

New Development: Bath City Centre

Our latest off-plan development is located in Bath City Centre, next to a £270 million Berkeley regeneration project, which is set to transform the local area, generate exceptional levels of demand and push rental and property prices to new heights.

It offers 78 premium 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments with convenient access to the city’s leading universities.

The team have spent multiple days on site, including a drone filming day and plan several more before completion in Q3 2025.

Find Out More Here.

 

That's all for now.

Please get in touch with the team to discuss your property investment journey.  

 
Contact Us
